summary: THE BLEND DOOR FROZE -THIS  DISABLES THE CARS HEATING AIR CONDITION AND  DEFROSTING SYSTEMS I CONTACTED THE DEALER- AND WAS TOLD IT WOULD COST $100.00 TO DETERMINE IF THAT WAS THE PROBLEM AND THAT FORD WOULD NOT HELP(THE DEALER CHECKED) ---I THEN CONTACTED  FORD MYSELF--I WAS TOLD TOO BAD--NO HELP . *JB
